hookReason: Posts the latest member departure in the given channel

helpWithChannel.en-US: I post the latest member departure in $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.fr: Je poste le dernier départ de membre dans $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto a partida mais recente de membro em $<channelMention>

helpWithoutChannel.en-US: I post the latest member departure
helpWithoutChannel.fr: Je poste le dernier départ de membre
helpWithoutChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto a partida mais recente de membro

greetings: $<memberMention> went along to help others to save bears, bye! :bear:
Looks like $<memberMention> and Baaren went separate ways... :eyes:
Smell! $<memberMention> has abandoned some super tasty honey! :honey_pot:
